net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j
Class FileHttpd

java.lang.Object
  net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j.Httpd
      net.homeip.donaldm.httpdbase4j.FileHttpd
All Implemented Interfaces:
HttpHandleable, Postable
public class FileHttpd
extends Httpd
implements HttpHandleable, Postable

Implementation of the abstract Httpd class for web content in the file system.

Author:
Donald Munro
See Also:
Httpd
